subtitle: A very simple recipe to make with a hint of fennel that gives the recipe a slight aniseed flavour.

method.text: Place cod steaks on pieces of foil large enough to wrap around fish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Season. Dot with butter. Place tomato slices and fennel sprigs on top.
Wrap foil around fish. Place parcels on baking tray.
Bake for 30 min or until fish flakes easily when tested with fork. Serve hot.

title: Fish baked with fennel
